info.title: VehiGo API docs
info.description: This is an API documentation, generated by L5 Swagger

post.description: Register or log in by users phone number
Log out user from app. Delete the acces token.
Validate the code sent to the users phone number.

requestBody.description: Pass the code, phone number and code type.

200.description: the user data and acces token.(Bearer)

get.description: Delete the current user token and returns the new one

200.description: The user data and acces token.(Bearer)

post.description: Validates the new user phone number with code sent to phone.

requestBody.description: Sends the code, phone number and code type for validation.

post.description: Requests a code for change to the new number.

requestBody.description: Pass the old and new phone number for validation.

200.description: Returns the success message + code type.

put.description: Updates the user car by id

delete.description: Deletes the user car by id

post.description: Creates a new user related car

get.description: Returns a set of data to user in app

put.description: Updates the user notification by id

delete.description: Deletes the user notification by id

post.description: Creates a new user related notification

delete.description: Returns a success meassge from delete user process..

bearer_Auth.description: A short description for security scheme
bearer_Auth.name: Authorization
